content: hatfield scarf the devil anse - lauren sanchez this scarf is in an interpretation of the one worn by kevin costner in the hatfields & mccoys mini series gauge 5 5 stitches to 1 materials approximately 600 yards of a dk weight yarn depending on the length desired feeling by lana gato shown 4 skeins used needles us 6 4mm or needle that gives you desired fabric size as shown 7 wide by 71 long cast on 55 k1 p1 for 9 row then start working chart chart starts on a right side row slip the first and last stitch as to purl of every right side row to create a neat selvage edge optional work chart until 70 long or desired length work 8 row in k1 p1 rib bind off in rib pattern
